content.prompt: In the work shown, Jacob Lawrence composed various visual elements primarily to comment on the

choices.label: plight of new immigrants who were trying to integrate into American society
economic disparities that existed in American society during the Great Depression
extreme power inequities that arose between American colonists and colonizers
discrimination that awaited Southern African Americans who had migrated to Northern cities

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
